# Duplicate Or Delete An Email Campaign

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/duplicate-or-delete-an-email-campaign/

## Category
10 Email Marketing

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
CAMPAIGNS
Duplicate or Delete an Email Campaign

You can duplicate Draft and Sent email campaigns, and you can delete Draft email campaigns.

Link copied
Duplicating an email campaign

To duplicate a Draft email, select the email in the Campaigns app and select Duplicate from the "..." menu.

To duplicate a Sent email, select the email in the Campaigns app and select Duplicate from the "..." menu.

Link copied
Deleting an email campaign

To delete a Draft email, select the email in the Campaigns app and select Delete from the "..." menu.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
